name: SHADOW STEP
description:
Shadow Step - Hardcore 3D game, if your nerves are not all right, then I do not advise you to start the game, it will make you very angry.
How to pass through dangerous territory, if you can see your steps? Blaze your own trail through uncharted and mysterious territory! Eliminate obstacles and get to the finish line!

How to play?
  • Control your player with the arrow keys.
  • When walking clears the path from obstacles.
  • Enjoy the mysterious atmosphere.

  • Increasing difficulty
  • 15 levels
  • Nice graphics
  • Interesting puzzle
  • Sound effects
